医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员获得 950 万美元用于研究多酚对认知健康的影响加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心的研究人员与爱尔兰共和国和北爱尔兰的研究人员合作，在欧洲资助机构的支持下，获得了美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 颁发的 950 万美元奖金；爱尔兰科学基金会 (SFI) 和公共卫生机构健康与社会关怀 (HSC) -；研究多酚对认知健康和脑肠微生物组系统的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Researchers-receive-2495M-to-study-polyphens-impact-on-cognitive-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Researchers-receive-2495M-to-study-polyphens-impact-on-cognitive-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad9266e5-84df-4e81-a79c-188b27eff1b4 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 16:13:24 -0400 Researchers receive $9.5M to study polyphenols' impact on cognitive health
三倍体导致 42% 的马早期流产马的染色体和怀孕与人类有许多重要的相似之处，一项针对马的研究表明，怀孕前两个月的流产和自然流产中有 42% 是由于一组额外染色体（称为三倍体）的并发症造成的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Triploidy-causes-4225-of-early-miscarriages-in-horses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Triploidy-causes-4225-of-early-miscarriages-in-horses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a9d20cc-71ec-4878-9eec-4ba0a0b81e00 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 16:10:15 -0400 Triploidy causes 42% of early miscarriages in horses
21 名 Ochsner Health 护士入选 2024 年路易斯安那州 100 名伟大护士名单Ochsner Health 自豪地宣布，21 名 Ochsner 护士已被伟大 100 护士基金会提名进入 2024 年路易斯安那州 100 名伟大护士名单。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/21-Ochsner-Health-nurses-recognized-on-the-2024-Great-100-Nurses-of-Louisiana-list.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/21-Ochsner-Health-nurses-recognized-on-the-2024-Great-100-Nurses-of-Louisiana-list.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9519b2e6-a280-4989-80e4-6190405d6ca7 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 16:06:47 -0400 21 Ochsner Health nurses recognized on the 2024 Great 100 Nurses of Louisiana list
新型生物活性材料使大动物模型膝关节再生优质软骨西北大学科学家开发出一种新型生物活性材料，成功在大型动物模型的膝关节中再生出高质量的软骨。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/New-bioactive-material-regenerates-high-quality-cartilage-in-the-knee-joints-of-large-animal-model.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/New-bioactive-material-regenerates-high-quality-cartilage-in-the-knee-joints-of-large-animal-model.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c61ac0c3-6ca8-4faf-b7bf-5a2d1149c0da Mon, 05 Aug 2024 16:02:59 -0400 New bioactive material regenerates high-quality cartilage in the knee joints of large-animal model
研究：2022 年因吸毒过量死亡人数增加 500% 以上根据哥伦比亚大学梅尔曼公共卫生学院的一项研究，2022 年因吸毒过量死亡人数增加了 500% 以上，其中合成阿片类药物所致。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Study-Drug-involved-overdose-deaths-increased-by-over-50025-in-2022.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Study-Drug-involved-overdose-deaths-increased-by-over-50025-in-2022.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bda6fe4a-64c9-43a4-89e5-b7bb04666b20 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 15:57:12 -0400 Study: Drug-involved overdose deaths increased by over 500% in 2022
快速、非侵入性工具可追踪迷幻药物在大脑中激活的神经元和生物分子加州大学戴维斯分校的研究人员开发了一种快速、无创的工具来追踪迷幻药物在大脑中激活的神经元和生物分子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Rapid-nonpressive-tool-tracks-neurons-and-biomolecules-activated-in-the-brain-by-psychedelic-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Rapid-nonpressive-tool-tracks-neurons-and-biomolecules-activated-in-the-brain-by-psychedelic-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2760298-195e-4c2d-bf8a-b8fd736d9816 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 15:50:57 -0400 Rapid, noninvasive tool tracks neurons and biomolecules activated in the brain by psychedelic drugs
研究表明，舞蹈疗法可以减少种族欺凌并增强不同学生的同理心欺凌是学校暴力最常见的表现形式。随着全球化和移民增加了美国学校课堂的多样性，种族欺凌——针对他人种族背景或文化身份的欺凌，包括种族嘲讽/诽谤以及对特定文化习俗、食物、服装和口音的侮辱性提及被同侪群体排斥的情况有所增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Dance-therapy-reduces-ethnic-bullying-and-enhances-empathy-in-diverse-students-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Dance-therapy-reduces-ethnic-bullying-and-enhances-empathy-in-diverse-students-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bca4d340-f332-44f1-b7f4-138f809c506b Mon, 05 Aug 2024 15:44:18 -0400 Dance therapy reduces ethnic bullying and enhances empathy in diverse students, study shows
突破性多发性硬化症药物利用绿曼巴毒液促进髓磷脂修复经过十年的努力，加上绿曼巴蛇的一点帮助，我们研制出了一种很有前途的新药，目前已经在临床试验中进行测试。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Breakthrough-MS-drug-uses-green-mamba-venom-discovery-to-promote-myelin-repair.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Breakthrough-MS-drug-uses-green-mamba-venom-discovery-to-promote-myelin-repair.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f264c4a3-0447-4de5-8eb6-171a7fe44ca0 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 15:35:59 -0400 Breakthrough MS drug uses green mamba venom discovery to promote myelin repair
Carrie Elks 博士获得 NIDDK 140 万美元资助，用于探索脂肪细胞通讯和胰岛素抵抗美国国立卫生研究院国家糖尿病、消化和肾脏疾病研究所 (NIDDK) 向彭宁顿生物医学研究员 Carrie Elks 博士授予了 140 万美元的资助，用于研究脂肪细胞中的胰岛素抵抗和炎症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Dr-Carrie-Elks-receives-2414-million-NIDDK-grant-to-explore-fat-cell-communication-and-insulin-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Dr-Carrie-Elks-receives-2414-million-NIDDK-grant-to-explore-fat-cell-communication-and-insulin-resistance.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63b0b2d6-26f5-41f8-bdb9-2a96f46dd266 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 15:18:18 -0400 Dr. Carrie Elks receives $1.4 million NIDDK grant to explore fat cell communication and insulin resistance
PSU 获得 190 万美元拨款，用于重新设计残疾学生教育工作者的培训改善残疾学生从高中过渡到高等教育和就业的成果，首先要为支持他们的中学教育工作者提供有效的培训和发展机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/PSU-receives-2419-million-grant-to-redesign-training-for-educators-of-students-with-disability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/PSU-receives-2419-million-grant-to-redesign-training-for-educators-of-students-with-disability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f6d4666-7296-4191-ba41-c290093f9114 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 15:15:12 -0400
